page.title: 14GORING GIRL GUIDES
page.content:
My name is Louise Fincham. I belong to a{Guide}company in Goring which meets on Monday nights from 7.30 to 9.00 pm. The company is called 1st Goring. The uniform includes a navy skirt, blue shirt, pale blue tie, navy hat, white socks, brown or black shoes and a{Guide}badge.
At{Guides}we are divided into groups called patrols. Each patrol in turn clears up, chooses a prayer etc.
In{Guides}there are many activities such as rounders, camping and outings, as well as taking badges eg. first aid, hostess and country dancing. Every week we play a game eg. traffic lights or ladders, and finish the meeting with a prayer and the guide song Taps.
